metadata.title: CVE-2022-27418 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Tcpreplay v4.4.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in do_checksum_math at/tcpedit/checksum.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-2').
